    • buildGrid

      public void buildGrid​(int rows, int columns, int mirrors)
      Name: buildGrid Method used to build a grid with all its boxes (nodes) and mirrors present.
      pre: The user has already specified the rows number, the columns number and the mirrors number to create the grid.
      post: Grid built and ready to play.
      Parameters:
      rows - - Grid rows - rows = int, rows != null, nickname != 0.
      columns - - Grid columns - columns = int, columns != null, columns != 0.
      mirrors - - Number of mirrors in the game.getGrid() - mirrors = int, mirrors != null, mirrors != 0.

    • shootLaser

      public java.lang.String shootLaser​(java.lang.String shot, java.lang.String nickname, int rows, int columns, int mirrors)
      Name: shootLaser Method used to shoot the laser beam at an edge or corner location of the grid so that it goes through it bouncing off the mirrors.
      pre: The user has already entered a command to make a laser shot.
      post: Shooting start location and shooting end location of the laser beam in question determined and printed in the grid with 'S' ("Start") and 'E' ("End").
      Parameters:
      shot - - Command entered by the user indicating a cell nomenclature and eventually the shot direction - shot = String, shot != null, shot != "".
      nickname - - User nickname - nickname = String, nickname != null, nickname != "".
      rows - - Grid rows - rows = int, rows != null, nickname != 0.
      columns - - Grid columns - columns = int, columns != null, columns != 0.
      mirrors - - Number of mirrors in the grid - mirrors = int, mirrors != null, mirrors != 0.
      Returns:
      A not empty String if something went wrong, or an empty String otherwise.

    • guessMirror

      public java.lang.String guessMirror​(java.lang.String guess, java.lang.String nickname)
      Name: guessMirror Method used to guess the location of a mirror in the grid.
      pre: The number of mirrors remaining must be different from 0. The user has already fired the laser beam for the first time.
      post: Guessing process of a mirror.
      Parameters:
      guess - - Command to guess the mirror - guess = String, guess != null, guess != "".
      nickname - - User nickname - nickname = String, nickname != null, nickname != "".
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the

    • loadUsers

      public void loadUsers() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Name: loadUsers Method used to deserialize all the User nodes stored in the binary search tree, loading just its root.
      post: Loading process determined of all the User nodes stored in the binary search tree.
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - - if the program tries to load in a class through its String name but no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot read the file properly while loading.

    • scoreCalculation

      public double scoreCalculation​(int rows, int columns, int mirrors)
      Name: scoreCalculation Method used to calculate the score of a user after winning, or after returning to the main menu without finishing the game.
      pre: The user won the game, or the user returned to the main menu without finishing or winning the game.
      post: User score calculated.
      Parameters:
      rows - - Grid rows - rows = int, rows != null, nickname != 0.
      columns - - Grid columns - columns = int, columns != null, columns != 0.
      mirrors - - Number of mirrors in the game.getGrid() - mirrors = int, mirrors != null, mirrors != 0.
      Returns:
      A double with the user score rounded to 4 decimal places.
